statements: SELECT * FROM nano_particles;
SELECT particle_name, size, measurement_date FROM nano_particles;
SELECT particle_id, particle_name, size, growth_rate FROM nano_particles;
SELECT particle_name, size FROM nano_particles WHERE growth_rate > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT particle_name, size FROM nano_particles WHERE size < 100 ORDER BY particle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT particle_name, growth_rate FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 50 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC, particle_name ASC;
SELECT particle_id, size, growth_rate FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 20 AND growth_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY size DESC, growth_rate ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT measurement_date FROM nano_particles ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT particle_name, size FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 100;
SELECT particle_name, growth_rate FROM nano_particles ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT particle_name, measurement_time FROM nano_particles JOIN growth_rate_history ON nano_particles.id = growth_rate_history.particle_id;
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE size > 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT particle_name, size FROM nano_particles WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY size ASC
SELECT id, particle_name, size, growth_rate FROM nano_particles WHERE size <= 5 AND growth_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT np.particle_name, gr.growth_rate, gr.measurement_time FROM nano_particles np INNER JOIN growth_rate_history gr ON np.id = gr.particle_id WHERE np.size BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY gr.measurement_time DESC
SELECT * FROM nano_particles WHERE particle_name LIKE '%oxide%' AND created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM NanoParticles;
SELECT particle_name, growth_rate FROM NanoParticles ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM ParticleResearcher WHERE department = 'Physics';
SELECT analysis_id, particle_id, analysis_date FROM ParticleAnalysis WHERE result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM ParticleAnalysis JOIN ParticleResearcher ON ParticleAnalysis.researcher_id = ParticleResearcher.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM ParticleResearcher WHERE department = 'Physics';
SELECT particle_name, growth_rate FROM NanoParticles WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM ParticleResearcher ORDER BY department;
SELECT particle_name, result FROM NanoParticles n JOIN ParticleAnalysis a ON n.particle_id = a.particle_id WHERE result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY particle_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, analysis_date FROM ParticleResearcher r JOIN ParticleAnalysis a ON r.researcher_id = a.researcher_id WHERE analysis_date <= DATE '2022-10-10';
SELECT * FROM Particle;
SELECT particle_id, size FROM Particle WHERE size > 100;
SELECT particle_id, rate FROM Particle ORDER BY particle_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, lab_id FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT experiment_id, start_time, end_time FROM Experiment WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Particle ORDER BY size DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT particle_id, size, rate FROM Particle WHERE rate > 0.5 AND size BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY rate DESC;

SELECT p.particle_id, p.size, r.researcher_name FROM Particle p JOIN Experiment e ON p.particle_id = e.particle_id JOIN Researcher r ON r.researcher_id = e.researcher_id WHERE r.lab_id = 1 ORDER BY r.researcher_name;

SELECT e.experiment_id, p.size, r.researcher_name, l.lab_name FROM Experiment e JOIN Particle p ON e.particle_id = p.particle_id JOIN Researcher r ON e.researcher_id = r.researcher_id JOIN Lab l ON r.lab_id = l.lab_id ORDER BY e.end_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT lab_id) AS num_labs, MAX(rate) AS max_rate FROM Particle WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM NanoParticles;
SELECT particle_id, size, growth_rate FROM NanoParticles;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date, log_id FROM ExperimentLogs ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Chemistry';
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE apparatus_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM NanoParticles;
SELECT particle_id, size, measurement_unit FROM NanoParticles WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT log_id, experiment_date, researcher_name, Apparatus.apparatus_name FROM ExperimentLogs JOIN Apparatus ON ExperimentLogs.apparatus_id = Apparatus.apparatus_id;

SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, Researchers.department, Experiments.experiment_date FROM Researchers JOIN Experiments ON Researchers.researcher_id = Experiments.researcher_id WHERE Experiments.apparatus_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NanoParticles WHERE size BETWEEN 2.0 AND 5.0;
